description: He delivers an Easter service in an almost empty St Peter's Basilica because of the coronavirus lockdown.
title: Coronavirus: Pope Francis urges people not to 'yield to fear'
title_page: Coronavirus: Pope Francis urges people not to 'yield to fear' - BBC News
maintext: "Then too, there was fear about the future and all that would need to be rebuilt. A painful memory, a hope cut short. For them, as for us, it was the darkest hour," he said.
